entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
